entries: If Gundroc fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: Gundroc can't be affected or detected by spells of 3rd level or lower unless he wishes to be. He has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Padded Feet
entries: Gundroc has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks to move silently.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If Gundroc surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Gundroc makes three weapon attacks in any combination.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw}  {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw}  {@hit 15} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: Melee  or Ranged Weapon Attack:  {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d6 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bark Orders {@recharge 4}
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Gundroc who can hear and understand him can use a reaction to move up to its speed and take the Attack action.

reaction.name: Bolstering Pride
entries: When another creature within 60 feet of Gundroc who can hear and understand him makes a saving throw, Gundroc can give that creature advantage on the saving throw.

monster.name: Jarvis

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Jarvis's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 24}). Jarvis can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Jarvis is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). Jarvis can cast {@spell disguise self} and {@spell invisibility} at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Staff Spellcasting
headerEntries: While holding his {@item staff of the magi}, Jarvis can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). These spells require charges; the staff has 50 charges, and it regains {@dice 4d6 + 2} expended charges daily at dawn. If Jarvis expends the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 20, the staff regains {@dice 1d12 + 1} charges.
2 charges each: {@spell flaming sphere}, {@spell invisibility}, {@spell knock}, {@spell web}
3 charges: {@spell dispel magic}
4 charges each: {@spell ice storm}, {@spell wall of fire}
5 charges each: {@spell passwall}, {@spell telekinesis}

7 charges each: {@spell conjure elemental}, {@spell fireball} (7th-level version, {@damage 12d6} fire damage), {@spell lightning bolt} (7th-level version, {@damage 12d6} lightning damage), {@spell plane shift}

Jarvis can also use an action to cast one of the following spells from the staff without using any charges: {@spell arcane lock}, {@spell detect magic}, {@spell enlarge/reduce}, {@spell light}, {@spell mage hand}, or {@spell protection from evil and good}.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Jarvis wears a grey {@item robe of the archmagi} and a {@item ring of mind shielding}, and wields a {@item staff of the magi} (all accounted for in his statistics).

trait.name: Displacement
entries: Jarvis projects a magical illusion that makes him appear to be standing in a place a few inches from his actual location, causing attack rolls against him to have disadvantage. If he is hit by an attack, is incapacitated, or has a speed of 0, this trait is disrupted until the start of his next turn.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: Jarvis has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Grakthor fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: While wearing his {@item robe of the archmagi}, Jarvis has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: {@item Ring of Mind Shielding}
entries: While wearing his {@item ring of mind shielding}, Jarvis is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read his thoughts, determine whether he is lying, know his alignment, or know his creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with him only if he allows it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Jarvis makes three Arcane Burst attacks and uses Spellcasting or Staff Spellcasting.

action.name: Arcane Burst
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) psychic damage.

action.name: {@item Staff of the Magi}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Jarvis takes the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

reaction.name: Spell Absorption
entries: While holding his {@item staff of the magi}, Jarvis can use his reaction when another creature casts a spell that targets only him. If he does, the staff absorbs the magic of the spell, canceling its effect and gaining a number of charges equal to the absorbed spell's level. Jarvis can't use this reaction if doing so would bring the staff's total number of charges above 50.

legendaryHeader: Jarvis can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Jarvis regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Jarvis teleports 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Cantrip (Costs 2 actions)
entries: Jarvis makes an Arcane Burst attack or casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 actions)
entries: Jarvis casts a spell using a spell slot from his Spellcasting trait, or uses Staff Spellcasting.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Myar'a's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 25}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Myar'a is an 18th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 25}, {@hit 17} to hit with spell attacks). Myar'a knows the following spells:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Myar'a wears a unique set of {@item elven chain} enchanted with the properties of a {@creature flail snail|VGM|flail snail's} shell (See "Spell Reflection Chain" below). She also wears a {@item cloak of protection}, keeps a {@item +3 bloodwell vial|TCE} in a hidden pocket of her coat, and wields a {@item +3 rapier} that she can conceal by sliding it into the cane she carries.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede Myar'a's darkvision.

trait.name: Distant Spell (3/Day)
entries: When Myar'a casts a spell that has a range of 5 feet or greater, she can double the range of the spell.
When she casts a spell that has a range of self, she can make the range of the spell 30 feet.

trait.name: Drow Fire Affinity
entries: Myar'a's weapon attacks are magical. When Myar'a hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage (included in the attack).
She also has advantage on saving throws against fire damage.

trait.name: Elven Accuracy
entries: Whenever Myar'a has advantage on an attack roll using Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma, she can reroll one of the dice once.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Myar'a has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Quickened Spell (3/Day)
entries: When she casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, Myar'a can change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

trait.name: Spell Reflection Chain
entries: While wearing her {@item elven chain}, Myar'a has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature making a spell attack against her has disadvantage on the attack roll. If Myar'a succeeds on her saving throw against a spell or a spell attack misses her, an additional effect might occur, as determined by rolling a {@dice d6}:

items.name: 1–2
items.entry: If the spell affects an area or has multiple targets, it fails and has no effect. If the spell targets only Myar'a, it has no effect on her and is reflected back at the caster, using the spell slot level, spell save DC, attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the caster.

items.name: 5–6
items.entry: The {@item elven chain} converts some of the spell's energy into a burst of destructive force. Each creature within 30 feet of Myar'a must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage 1d6} force damage per level of the spell on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Subtle Spell (3/Day)
entries: When she casts a spell, Myar'a can cast it without any somatic or verbal components.

trait.name: Twinned Spell (3/Day)
entries: When Myar'a casts a spell that targets only one creature and doesn't have a range of self, she can target a second creature in range with the same spell. The spell must be incapable of targeting more than one creature at the level at which it is cast.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces Myar'a to 0 hit points, she must make a Charisma saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, she drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Veil of Death
entries: Myar'a has advantage on death saving throws.

bonus.name: Shadow Walk
entries: While in dim light or darkness, Myar'a turns {@condition invisible} and magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see that is also in dim light or darkness.

bonus.name: Umbral Form (4/Day)
entries: Myar'a magically transforms herself into a shadowy form. In this form, she has resistance to all damage except force and radiant damage, and she can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain.
Myar'a remains in this form for 1 minute. It ends early if she is incapacitated, if she dies, or if she dismisses it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Myar'a makes three attacks in any combination and uses Spellcasting or Innate Spellcasting.

action.name: Shadow Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 17} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

monster.name: Ninani

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ninani is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). Ninani can cast {@spell charm person} and {@spell detect thoughts} at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Staff Spellcasting
headerEntries: While holding her {@item staff of the magi}, Ninani can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). These spells require charges; the staff has 50 charges, and it regains {@dice 4d6 + 2} expended charges daily at dawn. If Ninani expends the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 20, the staff regains {@dice 1d12 + 1} charges.
2 charges each: {@spell flaming sphere}, {@spell invisibility}, {@spell knock}, {@spell web}
3 charges: {@spell dispel magic}
4 charges each: {@spell ice storm}, {@spell wall of fire}
5 charges each: {@spell passwall}, {@spell telekinesis}

7 charges each: {@spell conjure elemental}, {@spell fireball} (7th-level version, {@damage 12d6} fire damage), {@spell lightning bolt} (7th-level version, {@damage 12d6} lightning damage), {@spell plane shift}

Ninani can also use an action to cast one of the following spells from the staff without using any charges: {@spell arcane lock}, {@spell detect magic}, {@spell enlarge/reduce}, {@spell light}, {@spell mage hand}, or {@spell protection from evil and good}.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Ninani wears a grey {@item robe of the archmagi} and a {@item ring of mind shielding}, and wields a {@item staff of the magi} (all accounted for in her statistics).

trait.name: Alter Memories
entries: When Ninani uses magic to {@condition charmed||charm} a creature, the target remains unaware that it was {@condition charmed}.

trait.name: Dual Mind
entries: Ninani has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Renestrae fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: While wearing her {@item robe of the archmagi}, Ninani has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: {@item Ring of Mind Shielding}
entries: While wearing her {@item ring of mind shielding}, Renestrae is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read her thoughts, determine whether she is lying, know her alignment, or know her creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with her only if she allows it.

trait.name: Thoughtsinger
entries: Ninani can speak telepathically to any creature she is psionically linked to. She can maintain links with up to seven other creatures at a time.
She can use her action to change which creatures she is linked to, and she can choose to let creatures she is linked to speak telepathically with each other through these connections.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ninani makes three Arcane Burst attacks and uses Spellcasting or Staff Spellcasting.

action.name: Arcane Burst
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) psychic damage.

action.name: {@item Staff of the Magi}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

reaction.name: Instinctive Charm {@recharge 4}
entries: When a visible creature within 30 feet of Ninani makes an attack roll against her, she forces the attacker to make a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker redirects the attack roll to the creature closest to it, other than Ninani or itself. If multiple eligible creatures are closest, the attacker chooses which one to target.

reaction.name: Spell Absorption
entries: While holding her {@item staff of the magi}, Ninani can use her reaction when another creature casts a spell that targets only her. If she does, the staff absorbs the magic of the spell, canceling its effect and gaining a number of charges equal to the absorbed spell's level. Ninani can't use this reaction if doing so would bring the staff's total number of charges above 50.

legendaryHeader: Ninani can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Ninani regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Ninani teleports 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

legendary.name: Cantrip (Costs 2 actions)
entries: Ninani makes an Arcane Burst attack or casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 actions)
entries: Ninani casts a spell using a spell slot from her Spellcasting trait, or uses Staff Spellcasting.

monster.name: Renestrae Silverhand

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Renestrae is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). Renestrae can cast {@spell detect magic} and {@spell misty step} at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Staff Spellcasting
headerEntries: While holding her {@item staff of the magi}, Renestrae can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). These spells require charges; the staff has 50 charges, and it regains {@dice 4d6 + 2} expended charges daily at dawn. If Renestrae expends the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 20, the staff regains {@dice 1d12 + 1} charges.
2 charges each: {@spell flaming sphere}, {@spell invisibility}, {@spell knock}, {@spell web}
3 charges: {@spell dispel magic}
4 charges each: {@spell ice storm}, {@spell wall of fire}
5 charges each: {@spell passwall}, {@spell telekinesis}

7 charges each: {@spell conjure elemental}, {@spell fireball} (7th-level version, {@damage 12d6} fire damage), {@spell lightning bolt} (7th-level version, {@damage 12d6} lightning damage), {@spell plane shift}

Renestrae can also use an action to cast one of the following spells from the staff without using any charges: {@spell arcane lock}, {@spell detect magic}, {@spell enlarge/reduce}, {@spell light}, {@spell mage hand}, or {@spell protection from evil and good}.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Renestrae wears a grey {@item robe of the archmagi} and a {@item ring of mind shielding}, and wields a {@item staff of the magi} (all accounted for in her statistics).

trait.name: Arcane Ward
entries: Renestrae adds her Intelligence score to her AC and initiative rolls (accounted for in her statistics).

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Renestrae has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Greater Magic Resistance
entries: Renestrae has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and she has resistance to damage from all magical sources.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Renestrae fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: {@item Ring of Mind Shielding}
entries: While wearing her {@item ring of mind shielding}, Renestrae is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read her thoughts, determine whether she is lying, know her alignment, or know her creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with her only if she allows it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Renestrae makes three Arcane Burst attacks and uses Spellcasting or Staff Spellcasting.

action.name: Arcane Burst
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) force damage.

action.name: {@item Staff of the Magi}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

reaction.name: Arcane Ward {@recharge 3}
entries: When Renestrae or a creature she can see within 60 feet of her takes damage, she magically creates a protective barrier around herself or the other creature. The barrier reduces the damage to the protected creature by 46 ({@dice 7d10 + 7}), to a minimum of 0, and then vanishes.

reaction.name: Negate Spell
entries: When Renestrae sees a creature within 60 feet of her casting a spell, she tries to interrupt it. If the spell is 6th level or lower, it fails and has no effect. If the spell is 7th level or higher, Renestrae makes an Intelligence check, adding her proficiency bonus ({@dc 10} plus the spell's level). On a successful check, the spell fails and has no effect. Whatever the spell's level, the caster takes 39 ({@damage 7d8 + 7}) force damage if the spell fails.

reaction.name: Spell Absorption
entries: While holding her {@item staff of the magi}, Renestrae can use her reaction when another creature casts a spell that targets only her. If she does, the staff absorbs the magic of the spell, canceling its effect and gaining a number of charges equal to the absorbed spell's level. Renestrae can't use this reaction if doing so would bring the staff's total number of charges above 50.

legendaryHeader: Renestrae can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Renestrae regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Renestrae teleports 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

legendary.name: Cantrip (Costs 2 actions)
entries: Renestrae makes an Arcane Burst attack or casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 actions)
entries: Renestrae casts a spell using a spell slot from her Spellcasting trait, or uses Staff Spellcasting.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ssesthraxa is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared, which don't require material components:

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: Ssesthraxa can use her action to polymorph into a Huge giant constrictor snake, or back into her Medium medusa form. Her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is transformed. Ssesthraxa reverts to her medusa form if she dies.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Ssesthraxa fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Ssesthraxa has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see Ssesthraxa's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of her, she can force it to make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw if she isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly {@condition petrified}. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the *greater restoration* spell or other magic.

Unless {@status surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Ssesthraxa until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Ssesthraxa in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.name: Venomous Weapons
entries: Ssesthraxa's weapon attacks are magical. When Ssesthraxa hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ssesthraxa makes three attacks in any combination. She can replace two attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

action.name: Snake Hair (Medusa Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw}  {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw}  {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 7d6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 21}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and Ssesthraxa can't constrict another target.

action.name: Scimitar (Medusa Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw}  {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 45 ({@damage 10d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Holy Fire (Medusa Form Only)
entries: {@atk rs}  {@hit 14} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d8 + 7}) radiant damage.

action.name: Poison Ray
entries: {@atk rs}  {@hit 14} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) poison damage.

bonus.name: Shed Skin (1/Day)
entries: Ssesthraxa can shed her skin as a bonus action to free herself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If Ssesthraxa spends 1 minute eating her shed skin, she regains hit points equal to half her hit point maximum.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Ssesthraxa moves up to her speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Ssesthraxa makes two attacks.

legendary.name: Constrict (Costs 2 actions)
entries: Ssesthraxa uses Constrict.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 actions)
entries: Ssesthraxa casts a spell using a spell slot.

monster.name: Tarasynora

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Renestrae is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). Tarasynora can cast {@spell false life} and {@spell web} at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

spellcasting.name: Staff Spellcasting
headerEntries: While holding her {@item staff of the magi}, Tarasynora can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save {@dc 24}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). These spells require charges; the staff has 50 charges, and it regains {@dice 4d6 + 2} expended charges daily at dawn. If Tarasynora expends the last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 20, the staff regains {@dice 1d12 + 1} charges.
2 charges each: {@spell flaming sphere}, {@spell invisibility}, {@spell knock}, {@spell web}
3 charges: {@spell dispel magic}
4 charges each: {@spell ice storm}, {@spell wall of fire}
5 charges each: {@spell passwall}, {@spell telekinesis}

7 charges each: {@spell conjure elemental}, {@spell fireball} (7th-level version, {@damage 12d6} fire damage), {@spell lightning bolt} (7th-level version, {@damage 12d6} lightning damage), {@spell plane shift}

Tarasynora can also use an action to cast one of the following spells from the staff without using any charges: {@spell arcane lock}, {@spell detect magic}, {@spell enlarge/reduce}, {@spell light}, {@spell mage hand}, or {@spell protection from evil and good}.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Tarasynora wears a black {@item robe of the archmagi} and a {@item ring of mind shielding}, and wields a {@item staff of the magi} (all accounted for in her statistics).

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When an undead under Tarasynora's control is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a burst of necrotic energy. Each living creature within 5 feet of the undead must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) necrotic damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Magic can't put Tarasynora to sleep.

trait.name: Grim Harvest
entries: When Tarasynora kills a creature with acid, cold, lightning, necrotic, or poison damage, she regains 24 ({@dice 3d10 + 7}) hit points.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Tarasynora fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: While wearing her {@item robe of the archmagi}, Tarasynora has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Tarasynora is destroyed, she gains a new body in {@dice 1d4} days, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of her phylactery, which is hidden in her chambers in the tallest tower of the Library of Stormreach.

trait.name: {@item Ring of Mind Shielding}
entries: While wearing her {@item ring of mind shielding}, Tarasynora is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read her thoughts, determine whether she is lying, know her alignment, or know her creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with her only if she allows it.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: Tarasynora is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: Tarasynora doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tarasynora makes three Arcane Burst attacks and uses Spellcasting or Staff Spellcasting. She can replace one Arcane Burst attack with a use of Paralyzing Touch.

action.name: Arcane Burst
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit +18} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) cold damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: {@item Staff of the Magi}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

reaction.name: Spell Absorption
entries: While holding her {@item staff of the magi}, Tarasynora can use her reaction when another creature casts a spell that targets only her. If she does, the staff absorbs the magic of the spell, canceling its effect and gaining a number of charges equal to the absorbed spell's level. Tarasynora can't use this reaction if doing so would bring the staff's total number of charges above 50.

legendaryHeader: Tarasynora can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Tarasynora regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: Tarasynora teleports 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

legendary.name: Cantrip (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tarasynora makes an Arcane Burst attack or casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tarasynora uses her Paralyzing Touch.

legendary.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Tarasynora fixes her gaze on one creature she can see within 10 feet of her. The target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Tarasynora's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Tarasynora casts a spell using a spell slot from her Spellcasting trait, or uses Staff Spellcasting.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of Tarasynora must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
